attributes.action: Accept the "will of the people" on Brexit has changed and hold a public vote.
attributes.additional_details:
On the increase of people with "Remain" https://pollofpolls.eu/GB/23/post-brexit-eu-membership-polls 

On "Bregret"
https://yougov.co.uk/topics/politics/articles-reports/2019/03/01/where-we-stand-brexit
attributes.background:
Since the implications of Brexit have become clearer, 2018-19 polling shows a clear and growing trend away from the 'leave' position towards 'remain'.

The government should consult the public in an updated leave/remain referendum, to see if they act in our interests before they act at all.
